body_html:
Sorry, that happed on Pytorch 2.0, after I updated to unpublished Pytorch 4.0, the error changed to:
/opt/conda/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/ffi/../../lib/include/TH/THMath.h:190:3: error: 'for' loop initial declarations are only allowed in C99 mode
for (int i = 0; i < 6; ++i) {
^
error: command 'gcc' failed with exit status 1

^
error: command 'gcc' failed with exit status 1
body:
Sorry, that happed on Pytorch 2.0, after  I updated to unpublished Pytorch 4.0, the error changed to: 
/opt/conda/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/utils/ffi/../../lib/include/TH/THMath.h:190:3: error: 'for' loop initial declarations are only allowed in C99 mode
   for (int i = 0; i < 6; ++i) {
   ^
error: command 'gcc' failed with exit status 1
